project.name: OpenClaw
project.tagline: Run a personal AI assistant on your device, unifying all communication channels
project.description: Stop letting your data flow into cloud black holes. OpenClaw is a local-first multi-channel AI gateway that lets you deploy a private AI assistant on your own device. Supports 12+ platforms including WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, and Discord, with 60+ built-in skills. Make your AI truly yours.
